context: Yes, he played on Poland's national football team. He was a forward. Do you like football?
Oh interesting, what team was he on? I follow American football.
I believe he is the captain of the Poland national team. I too prefer American football.
I see, have you seen Remember the Titians? That's a great football movie
Yes! It was produced by Jerry Bruckheimer and stars Jim Irsay and Lucy Liu. Have you seen Jerry Maguire?
Yes, Denzel Washington is great in it. I have that's a great movie as well!
resp: Yes, Denzel is great. Another movie you might like with him is American Gangster.
